definitions.definition: a reptile with a very long thin body and no legs. There are many types of snake, some of which are poisonous.

examples.text: a snake coiled up in the grass
Venomous snakes spit and hiss when they are cornered.
There has been an increase in snake bite cases.
He writhed and hissed like a snake.
A small green snake slithered across the wet road.
He had a live snake draped over his shoulders.
He keeps a pet snake that he lavishes with affection.
She was bitten by a snake while walking through long grass.

definitions.definition: a person who pretends to be your friend but who cannot be trusted

examples.text: I came to realize that he's just a snake in the grass.

wordOrigin: Old English snaca, of Germanic origin.
